resources.string: F(x)tec Pro1 Kanji Mod
(Sym->漢字) F(x)tec Pro1 Qwerty - US
(Sym->漢字) F(x)tec Pro1 Qwerty - US - Shift as Fn
(Sym->漢字) F(x)tec Pro1 Qwerty - US - Fn+Tab
(Sym->漢字) F(x)tec Pro1 Qwerty - US - Shift as Fn - Fn+Tab
F(x)tec Pro1 Qwerty - Default
Fx Kanji Mod
\"言語と入力\" の \"物理キーボード\" 設定からキーボードレイアウトを変更できます。
設定: 言語と入力
\"物理キーボード\" の設定から、キーボードレイアウト（ソフトキーボードに渡されるキーコードのセット）を選ぶことができます。
設定: 物理キーボード
Open the physical keyboard layout configuration dialog:
Configure %s layout
Configure %1$s layout when virtual keyboard \"%2$s\" is selected
No physical keyboards were found. If you are using a Moto Mod keyboard, open the slider now to allow layout setup.
Note that Fx Qwerty does not work on Android 8 Oreo on BlackBerry phones!
https://github.com/epser/hwkbd_kanji
More information

In most cases you can also change your physical keyboard layout via Android Settings in Language & input => Physical keyboard. If you use that method and want to hide Fx Qwerty from the application launcher, press the below button:
下のボタンを押すとアプリケーションランチャーからこの説明表示アプリが削除されます。キーボードレイアウトは削除されません。:
Hide from launcher
ボタンを押すとこの画面が終了し、ランチャーから削除されます（端末の再起動後に反映されることがあります）。もう一度見たい場合はアプリを削除したのち再インストールしてください。
BlackBerry QWERTY keypad
BlackBerry AZERTY keypad
BlackBerry QWERTZ keypad

On the \"Choose keyboard layout\" dialog, press \"Setup keyboard layouts\" to open the full list of layouts. Select the Fx Qwerty layout appropriate for your device (Fx Qwerty layouts begin with \"F(x)tec Pro1\" in the alphabetical layout list) and then press the back button. Then select the Fx Qwerty layout you just added on the list.
このレイアウトはパッケージ名 \"Fx Kanji Mod\" でインストールされています。
Url
Changelog
Kanji Mod was based in the excellent Fx Qwerty 0.3.0 and FinQwerty. It provides several physical keyboard layouts to improve your F(x)tec Pro1 keyboard experience.

Note that if you have the BlackBerry Keyboard software keyboard enabled with a non-English software layout, the physical keyboard layout may be reset frequently. To avoid that, configure the software keyboard to use the English (US) layout via Settings => Language & input => BlackBerry Keyboard Settings => Input languages => English (United States) (and deselect all the other languages).

Note that BlackBerry resets the keyboard layout to the original default on every boot. You will need to re-enable Fx Qwerty after every time the phone is restarted. Enable the below option to show a reconfiguration shortcut notification whenever the phone has been restarted so that you do not need to manually navigate to this app every time:
Show a configuration shortcut notification when the phone has been restarted
Key layout re-setup required
Touch to open layout setup.
